type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.GenerateIdeaProject
type.description:
Generates an IDEA project file for root project *only*. If you want to fine tune the idea configuration

At this moment nearly all configuration is done via IdeaProject.

method.name: getIdeaProject
method.description: The Idea project model containing the details required to generate the project file.

property.name: ideaProject
property.description: The Idea project model containing the details required to generate the project file.
